enb_long_title: Sixteenth Sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies
sentences: At the SBSTA meeting on Thursday, 6 June, Parties concurred on the importance of implementing the climate monitoring principles adopted at COP-5.
An informal contact group, co-chaired by Sue Barrell (Australia) and David Lesolle (Botswana), was convened in the afternoon.
Following discussions on capacity building needs, the Co-Chairs adjourned the meeting to prepare a draft decision on guidance to Global Climate Observing System (GCOS).
Further informal discussions took place behind closed doors.
Conclusions were adopted on Thursday 13, June, without amendment.
